recommended_degree: Teknik Komputer, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem Informasi, Teknik informatika (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: The IT Intern will support the IT team in various infrastructure-related activities. Key responsibilities include assisting with migration projects, organizing devices and cabling, performing basic hardware testing, and providing general technical support as needed. This role offers hands-on experience in IT infrastructure and exposure to real-world technical operations.
